item.title: So... how do I upload my data?
item.description: One of the simplest stages, but which is usually the most problematic in our projects and tasks in R, is loading data.

item.title: Data type and structure
item.description: You’ve already seen how to work in R and Rstudio, you’ve learned to configure your working directory, install libraries and call them, about scripts and how useful they’re to work in R.

item.title: How does R work?
item.description: Before delving into data and Data structures in R, let’s know, configure and take into account RStudio environment generalities

item.title: What do I need to get started in R?
item.description: To start this adventure, the first thing you need is to install R and Rstudio, without them I think it would be very difficult to start our adventure.

item.title: ... and now a bit of theory!
item.description: We will start by telling you that R is one of the most widely used programming languages in scientific research
